title: South Essentials single-page ecommerce storefront conversion (static catalog + cart)

requirements.summary: Rebrand the portfolio homepage into a South Essentials storefront with the exact tagline and remove writer/portfolio positioning.
acceptanceCriteria: The hero section displays the brand name "South Essentials" and the tagline exactly as provided.
The top navigation no longer shows "Hariharan Ramani" or any writer/portfolio wording.
The page no longer presents writer portfolio sections (writer-focused About/Services copy) and instead presents storefront-style content sections appropriate for an ecommerce homepage.

file_operations.description: Update brand text to "South Essentials" (remove Hariharan Ramani wording and any HR-specific logo usage) and replace nav links with storefront section anchors (e.g., Categories, Products, Cart, Contact). Ensure clicks continue to use smooth scrolling via scrollToSection. Use shadcn-ui Button for nav items where appropriate; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Replace writer wordmark/subheading with storefront hero content: show "South Essentials" and the tagline exactly "your one stop shop for south indian products"; update primary CTA text to a storefront action (e.g., "Shop Products") and wire it to scroll to the Products section. Replace background imagery to storefront hero asset (wired in REQ-15). Use shadcn-ui Button for CTA; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Replace the portfolio page structure (About/Services) with storefront sections (Featured Categories, Products, Cart/Checkout), while keeping a single-page layout. Ensure TopNav anchors match section IDs, and remove all writer/portfolio-specific composition from the main content.

Update contact section wording from writer-focused copy ("Get in Touch", collaboration text) to storefront support/contact wording suitable for an ecommerce homepage. Keep section id="contact" for nav scrolling. Use existing shadcn-ui Card/Button patterns; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Replace portfolio-specific static content (writer bio, services) with storefront-appropriate static content used by the homepage (e.g., brief brand blurb/support contact details), or deprecate unused fields so no writer branding remains in the UI.

requirements.summary: Add a static storefront browsing experience with featured categories, product list from static data, and a client-side cart with placeholder checkout; update nav scrolling.
acceptanceCriteria: Users can scroll via the top nav to the new ecommerce sections (categories, products, cart/checkout, and any remaining footer/contact if present).
At least one default product is shown for each requested category, backed by static frontend data.
Users can add products to a cart, adjust/remove them, and see subtotal updates without page refresh.
No third-party payment integration is present; checkout is explicitly a placeholder.

file_operations.description: Add static storefront data models and seed data: the four required categories and a small set of products including name, price, image path, and category (at least one product per required category). Image paths must reference the generated assets wired in REQ-15.
Implement a small client-side cart hook (local React state) supporting add, remove, quantity adjust, and subtotal calculation; no persistence and no backend/payment integration.

Create a "Featured Categories" section (id="categories") highlighting: South Indian temples, silk sarees, South Indian snacks, traditional South Indian dance forms. Render category cards using shadcn-ui Card/Button (or Card alone) for consistent styling; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a Products section (id="products") that renders products from frontend/src/content/storefrontData.ts, showing name, price, image, category, and an "Add to cart" action. Use shadcn-ui Card/Button for product tiles/actions; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a Cart section (id="cart") showing cart line items with quantity controls, remove action, and subtotal. Include a clearly labeled placeholder checkout action such as "Checkout (Coming Soon)" with no integrations. Use shadcn-ui Card/Button for layout/actions; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Wire FeaturedCategoriesSection, ProductsSection, and CartSection into the single-page layout in a storefront order. Connect ProductsSection and CartSection to the shared cart state (via useCart hook) so add/remove/quantity/subtotal updates happen client-side without refresh.

Ensure nav links scroll to the new section IDs: categories, products, cart, contact (and hero via brand click). Keep mobile menu behavior consistent. Use shadcn-ui Button for nav items; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add the required default generated themed images under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them in the hero and category UI (no backend image routing).
acceptanceCriteria: All required new images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced via /assets/generated/... paths in the UI.
Each of the four requested themes is visually represented on the homepage.
No backend endpoints are used to serve or transform images.

file_operations.description: Add generated image asset for hero: South Indian temple exterior in warm daylight, wide banner composition.
Add generated image asset for category: silk saree textile close-up with rich colors and traditional patterns.
Add generated image asset for category: assorted South Indian snacks arranged on banana leaf / traditional plating.
Add generated image asset for category: traditional South Indian dance form performance scene with expressive pose and costume.

Update hero background image reference to frontend/public/assets/generated/south-temple-hero.dim_1920x1080.png (served as a static asset). Ensure hero still renders "South Essentials" and the exact tagline. Use shadcn-ui Button for CTA; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Reference the generated category images using /assets/generated paths for the four categories: /assets/generated/silk-sarees-category.dim_1200x800.png, /assets/generated/south-snacks-category.dim_1200x800.png, /assets/generated/south-dance-category.dim_1200x800.png, and /assets/generated/south-temple-hero.dim_1920x1080.png where appropriate.

Render category imagery using the generated assets for all four themes so each is visually represented on the homepage. Use shadcn-ui Card for image + label presentation; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Update SEO/sharing metadata in frontend/index.html to match South Essentials storefront branding and include the exact tagline in the description.
acceptanceCriteria: The HTML <title>, meta description, og:title/og:description, and twitter:title/twitter:description reflect "South Essentials" and an English storefront description including the tagline.
No remaining SEO metadata references "Hariharan Ramani" or writer/portfolio positioning.

file_operations.description: Replace title/description/OG/Twitter metadata to use "South Essentials" and an English storefront description that includes the tagline exactly: "your one stop shop for south indian products". Remove or update any remaining references to Hariharan Ramani/writer portfolio positioning. Update favicon reference to avoid HR-branded favicon if it would conflict with the new storefront branding.
